law.catch_line: Effect of statutes on lands which are a part of more than one system.
law.text: Any component of the system that is a part of any state park, recreation area, or similar area shall be subject to the provisions of KRS 148.610 to 148.780 and the acts under which the other areas are administered, and in the case of conflict between the provisions of these acts the more restrictive provisions shall apply.
